name: PistolPunk
description:
A Cyberpunk shooter game for 2 players where you can upgrade or downgrade your character, but your statistics will be inverted when you were in the "inversion area".

This is a project for the MalagaJam VIII.

Developers:

Jonathan Rodriguez: https://jnyrr5.itch.io

Daniel Benítez: https://thefaith.itch.io 

Dionisio Romero: https://dionird20.itch.io 

Roberto Castillo: https://robercj.itch.io 

Gregorio Carvajal: https://hackbeam.itch.io

Julio Martínez: https://pplotaz.itch.io 

Marta Fernandez
